patthana16.85:1.1_0: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ pītisahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho napītisahagato
patthana16.85:1.1_1: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ pītisahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
patthana16.85:1.1_2: nasanidassanasappaṭigho napītisahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe… anidassanaappaṭighaṁ
patthana16.85:1.1_3: pītisahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho napītisahagato ca naanidassanasappaṭigho
patthana16.85:1.1_4: napītisahagato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe
patthana16.85:2.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ napītisahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nanapītisahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
